Name: Terminal Page
Description: Control your server with easily accessible settings available on this page. Manage your player, see your server status and run commands in the Minecraft console.

Name: Custom Settings Pages
Description: Configure your server with custom and user-friendly settings pages. This pages automatically verify your inputs and write them to the according configuration files to make your life easier.

Name: Built in Editor
Description: In case some configuration files do not yet have a custom page Fork offers a modern built-in editor so you can change your configuration files without Microsoft Notepad.

Name: Create Page
Description: Create servers or even whole proxy networks with a few clicks. Fork always supports the newest versions of each server type and will add even more types in the future.

Name: Import Page
Description:
Already got a Minecraft server set up?
We got you: Just tell us where it is on your system and we fully integrate it into Fork for you.
